db:article.db:para: This warning category is spelled [read-only-property] by qmllint.

db:section.db:title: Why is this bad?
db:section.db:para: The QML engine will throw a Type Error when it sees the write to a read-only property.

db:section.db:title: Example
db:section.db:para: To fix this warning, remove the write to the read-only property, write to another non-read-only property, or remove the readonly modifier if you are the author of the property definition.
